summary: When a small house flipping group discovers that their Hotel project may contain millions of cash hidden somewhere within, the project turns deadly.
cast: DJ Perry|Terence Knox|Lana Wood|Johnny Dark|Fred Griffith|Anthony Hornus|Tommy Lynch|Shawn Rougeron|Dean Mauro|Nathalie Ben-Kely|Tracilyn Jones|Charlene May|Noel Allison|David Borowicz|Michael Rivers|Dean Teaster|Laura Bendele|Sean Allen|Jim Brenson|Gaby Gonzalez|Rob Hughes|Derek Lyon|Paige Mires|Salvadore E. Reyes|David Rivas|Georgina Tade|Joey Tolomei|Chandra Wood
title: Renovation
